name: Engineer's Last Stand
description:
You've been left alone to delay the inevitable death by the alien horde with your turret building skills. Place turrets and dodge the monsters to survive as long as you can in this satisfying action game.

Created in FTE QuakeWorld engine in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50. The game's QuakeC source code is included in all downloads in game/src directory under MIT license.
